Default Templates

CareSuite provides four sample templates: ICU, Neonatal ICU, General Anesthesia and PACU. These templates have been designed to cover the needs of the basic CareSuite environments within a hospital. The encounter types and ICU property used by these templates are as follows:

Name

Encounter Type

ICU Property

ICU

Critical Care Encounter

1

Neonatal ICU

Critical Care Encounter

1

General Anesthesia

OR Encounter

0

PACU

OR Encounter

0
